GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.167
GSD.description:
net: fix NULL pointer in skb_segment_list

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.167 by commit 6446369fb9f083ce032448c5047da08e298b22e6, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 3a1296a38d0cf62bffb9a03c585cbd5dbf15d596. For more details please see the references link.
